overview: Sally D'Angelo is in her small home physical therapy practice, tidying up the place. The door opens and Jake Adams hobbles in on crutches for his first appointment, clearly in pain. He sees Sally and is immediately taken by her beauty. Rita Daniels answers her front door, greeting Alison Rey and her boyfriend Johnny Goodluck. She's heard SO much about him, it's great to put a face to the name, Rita says. Scarlett Sage is unwinding after spending her 18th birthday with her amazing family. As she tidies up around the house, she's lovingly watched over by her step-grandmother, Nina Hartley, and step-mother, Dee Williams.
title: Age & Beauty 2
